alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Eastern Lincoln County; Estancia Valley; Northeast Highlands; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued November 18 at 4:36PM MST until November 19 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in freezing fog. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Eastern Lincoln County, Estancia Valley, South Central Mountains, Northeast Highlands, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Black ice conditions will also be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Eastern Lincoln County; Estancia Valley; Northeast Highlands; South Central Mountains; Southwest Chaves County
